#!/bin/bash
echo ''
echo 'ğŸ” Checking for debug code...'
found=false
# Check for print() statements
if find src/beanllm -name '*.py' -type f -exec grep -l 'print(' {} \; 2>/dev/null | grep -v '__pycache__' | head -5; then
    echo 'âš ï¸  Warning: print() statements found (should use logger)'
    found=true
fi
# Check for console.log in playground
if [ -d playground/frontend ] && find playground/frontend/src -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -type f -exec grep -l 'console\.log' {} \; 2>/dev/null | head -5; then
    echo 'âš ï¸  Warning: console.log() found in frontend'
    found=true
fi
if [ "$found" = false ]; then
    echo 'âœ… No debug code found'
fi

#!/bin/bash
echo ''
echo 'ğŸ—ï¸  Verifying Clean Architecture...'
violations=0
# Check Handler â†’ Service implementation
if grep -r 'from.*service\.impl' src/beanllm/handler/ 2>/dev/null | grep -v '__pycache__'; then
    echo 'âŒ Handler â†’ Service implementation violation found'
    violations=$((violations + 1))
fi
# Check Domain â†’ Service
if grep -r 'from.*service\.' src/beanllm/domain/ 2>/dev/null | grep -v '__pycache__'; then
    echo 'âŒ Domain â†’ Service violation found'
    violations=$((violations + 1))
fi
# Check relative imports
if grep -r 'from \.\.' src/beanllm/ 2>/dev/null | grep -v '__pycache__' | grep -v '.pyc' | head -3; then
    echo 'âŒ Relative imports found (use absolute paths)'
    violations=$((violations + 1))
fi
if [ $violations -eq 0 ]; then
    echo 'âœ… Clean Architecture verified'
else
    echo "âš ï¸  $violations architecture violations found"
    echo 'ğŸ’¡ Run /arch-check for details'
fi
